name: Gem Miner (itch) (Indie_Mike)
description:
Mine ore and sell what you find to your friend that decided to tag along with you to the annual gem hunt, he will get all of your prize money counted up. He can be found in all of the cave levels, just have to look hard enough. Remember, you also need to guess all of the gems that you find correctly to be let out of the cave. But most importantly just chillax, and smash some stones, boxes, and sell loot. You don't have reach the win condition.

This is a submission for Krass-N.G. Jam 14. A 3 day long jam. This game was however made in two days because of setbacks on day 1.

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

E - Interact

LMB or F - Swing Pickaxe

Tab - Open/Close Inventory

Esc - Open/Close Pause Menu

LMB - interact with items in inventory
